titles.title: Take My Life and Let it Be

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take my life, and let it be Consecrated, Lord, to Thee Take my moments and my days, Let them flow in ceaseless praise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Here am I, Sisters: Here am I Brothers: All of me. Sisters: All of me. Brothers: Take my life. Sisters: Take my life Brothers: All for Thee. Sisters: It’s all for Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take my love; my Lord, I pour At Thy feet its treasure-store. Take myself, and I will be Ever, only all for Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Here am I, Sisters: Here am I Brothers: All of me. Sisters: All of me. Brothers: Take my life. Sisters: Take my life Brothers: All for Thee. Sisters: It’s all for Thee. (x2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take myself and I will be Ever, only, all for Thee.{/lang-eng}
